name: Papo Town Dessert Shop
summary: Papo Town Bakery is open today! Are you ready to taste lots of delicious desserts? Macaroons, cupcakes, donuts, fruit pies, cream cakes and ice creams... You’ll learn how to cook these beautiful and yummy desserts, and also satisfy your customers’ needs. With the coins you earned, decorate the diners upstairs! There are so many furniture for your choice. Where to place them, how to decorate the room, it's entirely up to you! Enjoy the fourfold fun of cooking, restaurant management and, house design and play house!
